relation.name: contactlistOfaccount
relation.sql: select a.* from contact as a where a.accountId=?

relation.name: account2crmuser
relation.sql: select a.* from crmuser as a inner join accountcrmuser as b on a.id=b.crmuserId where b.accountId=?

relation.name: crmuser2account
relation.sql: select a.* from account as a inner join accountcrmuser as b on a.id=b.accountId where b.crmuserId=?

relation.name: crmuser2activity
relation.sql: select a.* from activity as a inner join crmuser as b on a.crmuserId=b.id where b.id=?

relation.name: accountOfContact
relation.sql: select b.* from contact as a\,account as b where a.id=? AND b.id=a.accountId

relation.name: dealerContactlistOfdealerAccount
relation.sql: select a.* from dealerContact as a where a.dealerAccountId=?

relation.name: dealerAccountOfdealerContact
relation.sql: select b.* from dealerContact as a\,dealerAccount as b where a.id=? AND b.id=a.dealerAccountId

relation.name: crmuser2activity
relation.display: 参与此次拜访的销售代表
relation.sql: select crmuser.* from crmuser\,activity where activity.crmuserId=crmuser.Id AND activity.Id=?
